Project Leads

Alex Kuck

A proud citizen of the Internet with interests in sensor networks, mobile tech, cryptography, and distributed systems; non-computer hobbies include hiking, trains, and books on quantum mechanics (which he understands 6.62606957 x 10^(-34) percent of).

Nick Skelsey

A systems programmer with a passion for open government, Bitcoin, Oxford commas and Helvetica. Nick occasionally refers to himself in the third person and is a supporter of satire, short bios, and content that looks good on Web pages.
